name: elastic-otel-node
description: a monorepo for Elastic Node.js things for OpenTelemetry, you probably want ./packages/opentelemetry-node

scripts.ci-all: set -e; ls -d . packages/* examples | while read d; do (cd $d; echo; echo "> $d"; npm ci); done
scripts.clean-all: ls -d . packages/* examples | while read d; do (cd $d; echo "> $d"; rm -rf node_modules); done
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && ls -d packages/* | while read d; do (cd $d; npm run lint); done
scripts.lint:fix: eslint --ext=js,mjs,cjs .eslintrc.js scripts examples --fix && ls -d packages/* | while read d; do (cd $d; npm run lint:fix); done
scripts.test: ls -d packages/opentelemetry-node | while read d; do (cd $d; npm test); done
